name: cli-OpenStego
description: A cli utility to integrate with OpenStego to facilitate ease of use in terminal

scripts.openStegoGetAndUnzip: pnpm openStegoGetLatestZip && pnpm openStegoUnzip && pnpm openStegoCleanDownload
scripts.openStegoGetLatestZip: mkdir -p bin/downloaded && wget -q -O bin/downloaded/OpenStego.zip $(wget -q -O - 'https://api.github.com/repos/syvaidya/openstego/releases/latest' | jq -r '.assets[] | select(.name | test(".zip")) | .browser_download_url')
scripts.openStegoUnzip: unzip bin/downloaded/OpenStego.zip '**/lib/*' -d bin/downloaded && mv bin/downloaded/**/lib/*.jar bin/openstego.jar

author: Tebrithiel
